name: The Everlasting Arm, Inc.
description: Non-profit Christian homeless shelter that provides emergency shelter and clothing assistance to those in need. Offers a 16-bed emergency shelter for up to 90 days, food and clothing bank, and spiritual guidance services. Focused on helping individuals experiencing homelessness with immediate shelter needs and basic necessities.
source: Verified from multiple online directories and resource guides
notes: Christian-based organization providing emergency shelter and basic needs assistance. 16-bed capacity with 90-day stay limit. Also operates clothing bank and food assistance programs.
